name: Holeberg
description:
Get the ball to the flag .

A small game for the 2020 brackeys game jam which lasted a week. 

Use WASD to move, space to jump and R to rotate Vector Plates.

Scroll wheel to switch tools.

Hole Cutter : Cuts holes in the floor

Vector Plate : Adds force to the ball in the direction the vector plate is facing

Jump Plate : Makes the ball jump up in the air

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNUdijdsR3tG--B6jjhuSDQ?view_as=subscriber ----> Our YouTube
